name: MEC Double Hammock with Tree Straps
description:
Relax as you take care of the environment you're lounging in. This double hammock is made using a nearly zero waste production pattern, sized to reduce fabric waste while still allowing room for two people. Pack it away in its own pocket for convenient carrying in a backpack or tote.Made of lightweight and tear-resistant Pertex recycled polyester ripstop.DWR treatment sheds dew, condensation and light rain.Integrated stuff sack doubles as a pocket that fits a couple tall cans or a paperback.Webbing loops and carabiners at each end.Includes 2, 10ft. tree straps with integrated bartacked loops.Maximum capacity is 180kg.

        Sustainability
